about_the_game:
An in-depth look into Scorn's unique aesthetic. This 192-page digital artbook includes a curated collection of in-game art with never-before-seen imagery and concept designs.

Available in EPUB & MOBI format. The EPUB version of the e-book is best viewed on Thorium; for the MOBI version we recommend the Kindle app.


How to access
  • Scorn - The Art of the Game will be downloaded in the folder where the game is installed in your computer (tipically Program Files (X86)\Steam\steamapps\common[/i]).[/list]
